thread.title: NYC jury acquits Atlanta Hawks' Sefolosha in police fracas
thread.title_full: NYC jury acquits Atlanta Hawks' Sefolosha in police fracas

title: NYC jury acquits Atlanta Hawks' Sefolosha in police fracas
text:
> Sports NYC jury acquits Atlanta Hawks' Sefolosha in police fracas Thabo Sefolosha, center, leaves criminal court in New York, Friday, Oct. 9, 2015. The Atlanta Hawks' player was acquitted Friday in a case stemming from a police fracas outside a trendy New York City nightclub. (AP Photo/Seth Wenig) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
